body:
Fix build of versions <1.62.0 by removing Fiber from list of libraries to build.

Also compactify C++ standard handling and additionally remove `default` option due to difficulty of detecting compiler version-related conflicts with Fiber choice.

Add known conflict with C++17 for boost <1.63.0.

Improve variant management for Fiber; add variants for Context and Coroutine libraries.
title: boost: Fix build of versions <1.62.0
